analyzed: yatas bhyudaya niḥśreyasa siddhiḥ sa dharmaḥ

original: dharmaviśeṣa prasūtāt dravyaguṇakarmasāmānya viśeṣasamavāyānāṃ padārthānāṃ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ tattvajñānānniḥśreyasam / KVs_1,1.4 /
analyzed: dharma viśeṣa prasūtāt dravya guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyānām padārthānām sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasam  /

original: pṛthivyāpastejo vāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti dravyāṇi / KVs_1,1.5 /
analyzed: pṛthivī apaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam kālaḥ diś ātmā manaḥ iti dravyāṇi

original: ruparasagandhasparśāḥ saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhayaḥ sukhaduḥkhe icchādveṣau prayatnāśca guṇāḥ / KVs_1,1.6
analyzed: saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvam saṃyoga vibhāgau paratva aparatve buddhayaḥ sukha duḥkhe icchā dveṣau prayatnāḥ ca guṇāḥ

original: utkṣepaṇamavakṣepaṇaṃ ākuñcanaṃ prasāraṇaṃ gamanamiti karmāṇi / KVs_1,1.7 /
analyzed: utkṣepaṇam avakṣepaṇam ākuñcanam prasāraṇam gamanam iti karmāṇi

original: sadanityaṃ dravyavat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavaditi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmaviśeṣaḥ / KVs_1,1.8 /
analyzed: sat anityam dravyavat kāryam kāraṇam sāmānya viśeṣa vat iti dravya guṇa karmaṇām aviśeṣaḥ
dravya guṇayoḥ sajātīya ārambhaka tvam sādharmyam
dravyāṇi dravya antaram ārabhante guṇāḥ ca guṇa antaram

original: na dravyaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca bhavati / KVs_1,1.12 /

analyzed: kriyā guṇavat samavāyi kāraṇam iti dravya lakṣaṇam
dravya āśrayya guṇavān saṃyoga vibhāgeṣu akāraṇam anapekṣaḥ iti guṇa lakṣaṇam
eka dravyam aguṇam saṃyoga vibhāgeṣu anapekṣa kāraṇam iti karma lakṣaṇam
dravya guṇa karmaṇām dravyam kāraṇam sāmānyam

original: dvitvaprabhṛtayaḥ saṃkhyāḥ pṛthaktva saṃyoga vibhāgāśca / KVs_1,1.25 /
analyzed: dvi tva prabhṛtayaḥ saṃkhyāḥ pṛthak tva saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ ca

original: asamavāyāt sāmānyakāryaṃ karma na vidyate / KVs_1,1.26 /
analyzed: asamavāyāt sāmānya kāryam karma na vidyate  /
kāraṇa sāmānye dravya karmaṇām karma akāraṇam uktam
na tu kārya abhāvāt kāraṇa abhāvaḥ
bhāvaḥ nuvṛtteḥ eva hetu tvāt sāmānyam eva

original: dravyatvaṃ guṇatvaṃ karmatvaṃ ca sāmānyāni viśeṣāśca / KVs_1,2.5 /
analyzed: dravya tvam guṇa tvam karma tvam ca sāmānyāni viśeṣāḥ ca

original: saditi yato dravyaguṇakarmasu sā sattā / KVs_1,2.7 /
analyzed: sat iti yatas dravya guṇa karmasu sā sattā
dravya guṇa karmabhyaḥ ṛtha antaram sattā

original: guṇakarmasu ca bhāvānna karma na guṇaḥ / KVs_1,2.9 /
analyzed: guṇa karmasu ca bhāvāt na karma na guṇaḥ
aneka dravyavat tvena dravya tvam uktam  /
tathā guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇa tvam uktam
sat iti liṅga aviśeṣāt viśeṣa liṅga abhāvāt ca ekaḥ bhāvaḥ
rūpa rasa sparśavatyaḥ āpaḥ dravāḥ snigdhāḥ
sarpiḥ jatu madhūcchiṣṭānām agni saṃyogāt drava tvam adbhiḥ sāmānyam

original: trapusīsa loha rajata suvarṇānāmagnisaṃyogāddravatvamadbhiḥ sāmānyam / KVs_2,1.7 /
analyzed: trapu sīsa loha rajata suvarṇānām agni saṃyogāt drava tvam adbhiḥ sāmānyam

original: viṣāṇī kakudmān prāntevāladhiḥ sāsnāvān iti gotve dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgam / KVs_2,1.8 /
analyzed: viṣāṇī kakudmān prāntevāladhiḥ sāsnāvān iti go tve dṛṣṭam liṅgam  /

original: na ca dṛṣṭānāṃ sparśa ityadṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuḥ / KVs_2,1.10 /
analyzed: na ca dṛṣṭānām sparśaḥ iti adṛṣṭa liṅgaḥ vāyuḥ

original: vāyusannikarṣe pratyakṣābhāvāt dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ na vidyate / KVs_2,1.15 /
analyzed: vāyu sannikarṣe pratyakṣa abhāvāt dṛṣṭam liṅgam na vidyate  /
saṃjñā karma tu asmad viśiṣṭānām liṅgam
tat aliṅgam eka dravya tvāt karmaṇaḥ  /
kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakaḥ kārya guṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
kārya antara aprādurbhāvāt ca śabdaḥ sparśavatām aguṇaḥ

original: paratra samavāyāt pratyakṣatvācca nātmaguṇo na manoguṇaḥ / KVs_2,1.26 /
analyzed: paratra samavāyāt pratyakṣa tvāt ca na ātma guṇaḥ na manaḥ guṇaḥ
dravya tva nitya tve vāyunā vyākhyāte  /
śabda aliṅga aviśeṣāt viśeṣa liṅga abhāvāt ca
tad anuvidhānāt eka pṛthak tvam ca iti

original: puṣpavastrayoḥ sati sannikarṣe guṇāntarāprādurbhāvo vastre gandhābhāvaliṅgam / KVs_2,2.1 /
analyzed: puṣpa vastrayoḥ sati sannikarṣe guṇa antara aprādurbhāvaḥ vastre gandha abhāva liṅgam  /

original: aparasminnaparaṃ yugapat ciraṃ kṣipramiti kālaliṅgāni / KVs_2,2.6 /
analyzed: aparasmin aparam yugapad ciram kṣipram iti kāla liṅgāni
dravya tva nitya tve vāyunā vyākhyāte  /
nitya ūṣu abhāvāt anityeṣu bhāvāt kāraṇe kāla ākhyā iti
itas idam iti yatas tad diśyam liṅgam
dravya tva nitya tve vāyunā vyākhyāte  /

original: ādityasaṃyogāt bhūtapūrvāt bhaviṣyato bhūtācca prācī / KVs_2,2.14 /
analyzed: āditya saṃyogāt bhūta pūrvāt bhaviṣyataḥ bhūtāt ca prācī  /

original: tathā dakṣiṇā pratīcī udīcī ca / KVs_2,2.15 /

analyzed: sāmānya pratyakṣāt viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ
śrotra grahaṇaḥ yaḥ ṛthaḥ sa śabdaḥ
tulya jātīyeṣu artha antara bhūteṣu viśeṣasya ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt
saṃyogāt vibhāgāt ca śabdāt ca śabda niṣpattiḥ
indriya artha aprasiddhiḥ indriya arthebhyaḥ ṛtha antarasya hetuḥ
artha antaram hi artha antarasya anapadeśaḥ
saṃyogi samavāyi eka artha samavāyi virodhi ca
yasmāt viṣāṇī tasmāt gauḥ iti ca anaikāntikasya udāharaṇam
ātma indriya artha sannikarṣāt yat niṣpadyate tat anyat

original: pravṛttinivṛttī ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭe paratra liṅgam / KVs_3,1.19 /
analyzed: pravṛtti nivṛttī ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭe paratra liṅgam
ātma indriya artha sannikarṣa jñānasya bhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ ca manasaḥ liṅgam

original: tasya dravyatva nityatve vāyunā vyākhyāte / KVs_3,2.2 /
analyzed: tasya dravya tva nitya tve vāyunā vyākhyāte  /
prayatna ayaugapadyāt jñāna ayaugapadyāt ca ekam
prāṇa apāna nimeṣa unmeṣa jīvana manaḥ gati indriya antara vikārāḥ sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatnāḥ ca ātmanaḥ liṅgāni  /
tasya dravya tva nitya tve vāyunā vyākhyāte  /

original: yajñadatta iti sannikarṣe pratyakṣābhāvāt dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ na vidyate / KVs_3,2.6 /
analyzed: yajñadattaḥ iti sannikarṣe pratyakṣa abhāvāt dṛṣṭam liṅgam na vidyate  /
aham iti śabdasya vyatirekāt na āgamikam

original: yadi dṛṣṭamanvakṣamahaṃ devadatto 'haṃ yajñadatta iti / KVs_3,2.10 /
analyzed: yadi dṛṣṭam anvakṣam aham devadattaḥ ham yajñadattaḥ iti

original: dṛṣṭyātmani liṅge eka eva dṛḍhatvāt pratyakṣavat pratyayaḥ / KVs_3,2.11 /
analyzed: dṛṣṭi ātmani liṅge ekaḥ eva dṛḍha tvāt pratyakṣa vat pratyayaḥ  /

original: devadatto gacchati yajñadatto gacchatītyupacārāccharīre pratyayaḥ / KVs_3,2.12 /
analyzed: devadattaḥ gacchati yajñadattaḥ gacchati iti upacārāt śarīre pratyayaḥ  /

original: ahamiti pratyagātmani bhāvāt paratrābhāvādarthāntara pratyakṣaḥ / KVs_3,2.14 /
analyzed: aham iti pratyagātmani bhāvāt paratra abhāvāt artha antara pratyakṣaḥ
devadattaḥ gacchati iti upacārāt abhimānāt tāvat śarīra pratyakṣaḥ haṅkāraḥ
na tu śarīra viśeṣāt yajñadatta viṣṇumitrayoḥ jñāna viṣayaḥ
aham iti mukhya yogyābhyām śabda vat vyatireka avyabhicārāt viśeṣa siddheḥ na āgamikaḥ
sukha duḥkha jñāna niṣpatti aviśeṣāt aikātmyam
mahati aneka dravyavat tvāt rūpāt ca upalabdhiḥ
sati api dravya tve mahat tve rūpa saṃskāra abhāvāt vāyoḥ anupalabdhiḥ
aneka dravya samavāyāt rūpa viśeṣāt ca rūpa upalabdhiḥ
tena rasa gandha sparśeṣu jñānam vyākhyātam  /

original: saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyoga vibhāgau paratvāparatve karma ca rūpadravyasamavāyāt cākṣuṣāṇi / KVs_4,1.11 /
analyzed: saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvam saṃyoga vibhāgau paratva aparatve karma ca rūpa dravya samavāyāt cākṣuṣāṇi  /

original: etena guṇatve bhāve ca sarvendriyaṃ jñānaṃ vyākhyātam / KVs_4,1.13 /
analyzed: etena guṇa tve bhāve ca sarva indriyam jñānam vyākhyātam
tat punar pṛthivī ādi kārya dravyam trividham śarīra indriya viṣaya saṃjñakam

original: pratyakṣāpratyakṣāṇāṃ saṃyogasyāpratyakṣatvāt pañcātmakaṃ na vidyate / KVs_4,2.2 /
analyzed: pratyakṣa apratyakṣāṇām saṃyogasya apratyakṣa tvāt pañca ātmakam na vidyate
guṇa antara aprādurbhāvāt ca na tri ātmakam

original: tatra śarīraṃ dvividhaṃ yonijamayonijaṃ ca / KVs_4,2.5 /
analyzed: tatra śarīram dvividham yoni jam ayonijam ca
tathā hasta saṃyogāt ca musale karma

original: abhighātaje musalādau karmaṇi vyatirekādakāraṇaṃ hastasaṃyogaḥ / KVs_5,1.3 /
analyzed: abhighāta je musala ādau karmaṇi vyatirekāt akāraṇam hasta saṃyogaḥ
nodana viśeṣa abhāvāt na ūrdhvam na tiryaggamanam
maṇi gamanam sūci abhisarpaṇam adṛṣṭa kāraṇam
iṣau ayugapad saṃyoga viśeṣāḥ karma anya tve hetuḥ

original: nodanādādyamiṣoḥ karma tatkarmakāritācca saṃskārāduttaraṃ tathottaramuttaraṃ ca / KVs_5,1.17 /
analyzed: nodanāt ādyam iṣoḥ karma tad karma kāritāt ca saṃskārāt uttaram tathā uttaram uttaram ca  /
nodana abhighātāt saṃyukta saṃyogāt ca pṛthivyām karma
apām saṃyoga abhāve guru tvāt patanam

original: apāṃ saṅghāto vilayanaṃ ca tejaḥ saṃyogāt / KVs_5,2.8 /
analyzed: apām saṅghātaḥ vilayanam ca tejaḥ saṃyogāt

original: pṛthivīkarmaṇā tejaḥ karma vāyukarma ca vyākhyātam / KVs_5,2.12 /
analyzed: pṛthivī karmaṇā tejaḥ karma vāyu karma ca vyākhyātam

original: agnerūrdhvajvalanaṃ vāyostiryaggamanaṃ aṇūnāṃ manasaścādyaṃ karmādṛṣṭakāritam / KVs_5,2.13 /
analyzed: agneḥ ūrdhva jvalanam vāyoḥ tiryak gamanam aṇūnām manasaḥ ca ādyam karma adṛṣṭa kāritam  /
ātma indriya manaḥ rtha sannikarṣāt sukha duḥkhe

original: tadanārambha ātmasthe manasi śarīrasya duḥkhābhāvaḥ saṃyogaḥ / KVs_5,2.16 /
analyzed: tad anārambhe ātma sthe manasi śarīrasya duḥkha abhāvaḥ saṃyogaḥ
apasarpaṇam upasarpaṇam aśita pīta saṃyogāḥ kārya antara saṃyogāḥ ca iti adṛṣṭa kāritāni  /
dravya guṇa karma niṣpatti vaidharmyāt abhāvaḥ tamaḥ
diś kālau ākāśam ca kriyāvat vaidharmyāt niṣkriyāṇi
ātma antara guṇānām ātma antare kāraṇa tvāt  /

original: etena hīnasamaviśiṣṭa dhārmikebhyaḥ parasvādānaṃ vyākhyātam / KVs_6,1.12 /
analyzed: etena hīna sama viśiṣṭa dhārmikebhyaḥ para sva ādānam vyākhyātam
same ātma tyāgaḥ para tyāgaḥ vā
dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa prayojanānām dṛṣṭa abhāve prayojanam abhyudayāya
abhiṣecana upavāsa brahmacarya guru kula vāsa vānaprastha yajña dāna prokṣaṇa diś nakṣatra mantra kāla niyamāḥ ca a dṛṣṭāya
yat iṣṭa rūpa rasa gandha sparśam prokṣitam abhyukṣitam ca tat śuci

original: ayatasya śucibhojanādabhyudayo na vidyate niyamābhāvād vidyate vār'thāntaratvād yamasya / KVs_6,2.8 /
analyzed: a yatasya śuci bhojanāt abhyudayaḥ na vidyate niyama abhāvāt vidyate vā artha antara tvāt yamasya
icchā dveṣa pūrvikā dharma adharma pravṛttiḥ
pṛthivī ādi rūpa rasa gandha sparśāḥ dravya anitya tvāt anityāḥ ca

original: apsu tejasi vāyau ca nityā dravyanityavāt / KVs_7,1.4 /
analyzed: apsu tejasi vāyau ca nityāḥ dravya nitya vāt
kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakāḥ pṛthivyām pāka jāḥ
aṇoḥ mahataḥ ca upalabdhi anupalabdhī nitye vyākhyāte  /

original: aṇu mahaditi tasmin viśeṣabhāvāt viśeṣābhāvācca / KVs_7,1.11 /
analyzed: aṇu mahat iti tasmin viśeṣa bhāvāt viśeṣa abhāvāt ca
aṇu tva mahā tvayoḥ aṇu tva mahā tva abhāvaḥ karma guṇaiḥ vyākhyātaḥ

original: karmabhiḥ karmāṇi guṇaiśca guṇā vyākhyātāḥ / KVs_7,1.15 /
analyzed: karmabhiḥ karmāṇi guṇaiḥ ca guṇāḥ vyākhyātāḥ
aṇu tva mahā tvābhyām karma guṇāḥ ca vyākhyātāḥ
etena dīrgha tva hrasva tve vyākhyāte
vibhavāt mahān ākāśaḥ tathā ca ātmā
rupa rasa gandha sparśa vyatirekāt artha antaram eka tvam
ekatva ekapṛthaktvayoḥ ekatva ekapṛthaktva abhāvaḥ ṇu tva mahā tvābhyām vyākhyātaḥ

original: niḥ saṃkhyatvāt karmaguṇānāṃ sarvaikatvaṃ na vidyate / KVs_7,2.4 /
analyzed: niḥ saṃkhya tvāt karma guṇānām sarva eka tvam na vidyate  /
eka tva abhāvāt bhaktiḥ tu na vidyate
kārya kāraṇayoḥ ekatva ekapṛthaktva abhāvāt ekatva ekapṛthaktvam na vidyate  /
anyatara karma jaḥ ubha karma jaḥ saṃyoga jaḥ ca saṃyogaḥ
saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ saṃyoga vibhāga abhāvaḥ aṇu tva mahā tvābhyām vyākhyātaḥ

original: karmabhiḥ karmāṇi guṇairguṇā aṇutva mahattvābhyāmiti / KVs_7,2.12 /
analyzed: karmabhiḥ karmāṇi guṇaiḥ guṇāḥ aṇu tva mahā tvābhyām iti

original: yutasiddhyabhāvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyete / KVs_7,2.13 /
analyzed: yuta siddhi abhāvāt kārya kāraṇayoḥ saṃyoga vibhāgau na vidyete  /
asati na asti iti ca prayogāt
eka dikkābhyām eka kālābhyām sannikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭābhyām param aparam ca
paratva aparatvayoḥ paratva aparatva abhāvaḥ ṇu tva mahā tvābhyām vyākhyātaḥ

original: ihedamiti yataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ sa samavāyaḥ / KVs_7,2.26 /
analyzed: iha idam iti yatas kārya kāraṇayoḥ sa samavāyaḥ  /

original: guṇakarmasu sannikṛṣṭeṣu jñānaniṣpatteḥ dravyaṃ kāraṇam / KVs_8,1.4 /
analyzed: guṇa karmasu sannikṛṣṭeṣu jñāna niṣpatteḥ dravyam kāraṇam  /
sāmānya viśeṣeṣu sāmānya viśeṣa abhāvāt tat eva jñānam
sāmānya viśeṣa apekṣam dravya guṇa karmasu

original: guṇakarmasu guṇakarmābhāvāt guṇakarmāpekṣaṃ na vidyate / KVs_8,1.8 /
analyzed: guṇa karmasu guṇa karma abhāvāt guṇa karma apekṣam na vidyate

original: samavāyinaḥ śvaityācchvaitya buddheśca śvete budviste ete kāryakāraṇabhūte / KVs_8,1.9 /
analyzed: samavāyinaḥ śvaityāt śvaitya buddheḥ ca śvete budviḥ te ete kārya kāraṇa bhūte

original: kāraṇāyaugapadyāt kāraṇakramācca ghaṭapaṭādibuddhīnāṃ kramo na hetuphalabhāvāt / KVs_8,1.11 /
analyzed: kāraṇa ayaugapadyāt kāraṇa kramāt ca ghaṭa paṭa ādi buddhīnām kramaḥ na hetu phala bhāvāt

original: ayameṣa tvayā kṛtaṃ bhojayainaṃ iti buddhyapekṣam / KVs_8,2.1 /
analyzed: ayam eṣa tvayā kṛtam bhojaya enam iti buddhi apekṣam

original: bhūyastvāt gandhavattvācca pṛthivī gandhajñāne prakṛtiḥ / KVs_8,2.5 /
analyzed: bhūyaḥ tvāt gandhavat tvāt ca pṛthivī gandha jñāne prakṛtiḥ
tathā āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ca rasa rūpa sparśa aviśeṣāt
kriyā guṇa vyapadeśa abhāvāt prāk asat
asataḥ kriyā guṇa vyapadeśa abhāvāt artha antaram
yat ca anyat asat atas tat asat  /
asat iti bhūta pratyakṣa abhāvāt bhūta smṛteḥ virodhi pratyakṣa vat
etena a ghaṭaḥ gauḥ adharmaḥ ca vyākhyātāḥ

original: nāsti ghaṭo gehe iti sato ghaṭasya gehasaṃsargapratiṣedhaḥ / KVs_9,1.10 /
analyzed: na asti ghaṭaḥ gehe iti sataḥ ghaṭasya geha saṃsarga pratiṣedhaḥ
ātmani ātma manasoḥ saṃyogāt ātma pratyakṣam
asamāhita antar karaṇāḥ upasaṃhṛta samādhayaḥ teṣām ca

original: asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃyogi virodhi samavāyi ceti laiṅgikam / KVs_9,2.1 /
analyzed: asya idam kāryam kāraṇam saṃyogi virodhi samavāyi ca iti laiṅgikam
asya idam kārya kāraṇa sambandhaḥ ca avayavāt bhavati
hetuḥ apadeśaḥ liṅgam pramāṇam karaṇam iti anarthāntaram
asya idam iti buddhi apekṣita tvāt
ātmanaḥ saṃyoga viśeṣāt saṃskārāt ca smṛtiḥ
indriya doṣāt saṃskāra doṣāt ca avidyā
iṣṭa aniṣṭa kāraṇa viśeṣāt virodhāt ca mithas sukha duḥkhayoḥ artha antara bhāvaḥ  /
saṃśaya nirṇaya antara abhāvaḥ ca jñāna antara tve hetuḥ
eka artha samavāyi kāraṇa antareṣu dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: ekadeśe ityekasmin śiraḥ pṛṣṭhamudaraṃ marmāṇi tadviśeṣastadviśeṣebhyaḥ / KVs_10,1.7 /
analyzed: eka deśe iti ekasmin śiraḥ pṛṣṭham udaram marmāṇi tad viśeṣaḥ tad viśeṣebhyaḥ
tathā rūpe kāraṇa eka artha samavāyāt ca
dṛṣṭānām dṛṣṭa prayojanānām dṛṣṭa abhāve prayogaḥ bhyudayāya
